comments:
Race condition in ETypeImpl::getPropertiesGen ...

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
       at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.impl.ETypeImpl.getEProperty
(ETypeImpl.java:264)
       at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.impl.ETypeImpl.getProperty
(ETypeImpl.java:249)

There is a race condition in ETypeImpl::getPropertiesGen. I'm guessing
this is because the generated code doesn't expect to be accessed by
multiple concurrent threads... but as the object (ETypeImpl) is a wrapper
around a model object this is inevitable - as model objects are shared!

I'm changing the code so eAllStructuralFeatures is set only after the properties
has been set to an initialized state.  This should eliminate the possibility
that a race will result in one of the threads seeing null as the result for
properties.
The fix is available in the M200408040957.
